'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Points of interest==
* The workshop has two sections. You can find the [[Hasongo Workshop Records]] in the foyer, with [[Aimuro]] locked inside the workshop, opened with the [[Storeroom Key]]. The crate in the back contains ammunition for the bombard, an [[Explosive Shell]].
* A [[Coral nāga archer]] and [[Coral nāga warrior]] are by the storeroom door.
title: Engineering workshop
